title: Add Status Notification Event Handler
name: addStatusNotificationEventHandler
description: Adds a listener so transaction information can be retrieved. This listener fetches information from the following events : connectionStatusChanged, currentTransactionStatus. The corresponding removal method, removeStatusNotificationEventHandler, must be called before the end of your applications life-time to prevent memory leakage.

parameters.name: listener
parameters.notes: An implementation of the Events.Status interface

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the new listener was added successfully
